## GridPlugin interface

Grid plugin interface

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface GridPlugin 
```

## Properties

|  Property | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [gridPlugins](./grid.gridplugin.gridplugins.md) | <code>GridPluginInstances</code> | Grid plugin instances available for this plugin |
|  [options](./grid.gridplugin.options.md) | <code>any</code> | Options for grid plugin |
|  [pluginElement](./grid.gridplugin.pluginelement.md) | <code>ElementRef</code> | Element that represents plugin |

## Methods

|  Method | Description |
|  --- | --- |
|  [initialize()](./grid.gridplugin.initialize.md) | Initialize plugin, to be ready to use, initialize communication with other plugins |
|  [initOptions()](./grid.gridplugin.initoptions.md) | Initialize plugin options, all operations required to be done with plugin options are handled here |
|  [invalidateVisuals()](./grid.gridplugin.invalidatevisuals.md) | Explicitly runs invalidation of content (change detection) |
